title: Language Education Simulation Training Utilizing Self-Regulated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Simulation training course for pre-service and in-service teachers to enhance language instruction competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies in a given language teaching scenario with 80% accuracy
Learners can improve their teaching skills by at least three levels based on normative comparative feedback
Learners can perform sequential practice schedules with 90% adherence to achieve set learning objectives

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
